repositories.name: openstack-devops-suite
repositories.description: A modernized Terraform and Ansible-based solution to deploy a complete GitLab-centered DevOps platform on VMware OpenStack environments. This suite uses GitLab as the primary CI/CD and SCM platform, eliminating the need for Jenkins while providing comprehensive DevOps tooling optimized for VMware infrastructure.
